column4: How can I make sure that upon restart, my second HDD(NTFS) is mounted before a daemon (deluged) is ran?
insure the partion is added/shown in the file 'fstab' , /etc/fstab
my problem is when I restart my computer and deluged starts scanning /media/user/MyBook for my torrents it wont find it and I have to manually recheck my torrents when this happens
is /media/user shown in the file /etc/fstab ?
apparently not, only my system's and it's swap partition are there
is /media/user shown in the file /etc/mtab ? that's mtab
it is
using gedit in gksu mode, edit fstab to include the line you see in mtab showing '/media/user'
do you mind telling me, that besides probably fixing my problem what are we achieving with this?
sure, you are making that partion 'live' from boot time
